task.title: Sweet American Cinnamon Rolls
task.shortdesc: A delicious yet quick sweet treat for a pick-me-up breakfast. Perfect with a cup of hot, black coffee!

p.i: Be sure to check the pantry and fridge to make sure you have all ingredients on hand before beginning

taskbody.context:
To make this sweet treat, you'll need the following ingredients, appliances, and tools.
This recipe makes 4 servings and approximately 20 minutes to prepare. Ingredients
1 tube of refrigerated bread roll dough
1 stick butter
1 stick margarine
½ cup sugar
2 tablespoons of cinnamon
2 tablespoons of flour
Appliances
Oven
Microwave
Tools
Knife
Rolling pin
Bowl
Whisk

step.cmd: Flour your workspace (the counter) with a light dusting of flour.
Open up your bread roll dough and place it onto the floured workspace.
Roll out the dough until it is about ¼ inch thick and in a rectangular shape.
Melt butter in bowl and pour evenly onto dough.
Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon evenly over buttered dough.
Roll up the dough, starting on one of the long ends until you have a log-shape. (See figure 1 for an example)
Cut roll into 6 pieces and arrange on baking sheet. (See figure 1 for an example)
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown, then let cool for 10 minutes and enjoy!
